name: 白敦文
objective:
本課程將初步介紹資料科學之基礎，帶領學程學生學習基本程式設計及相關工具應用，如何由手上之現有資料或網路資料進行發想及定義問題、學習使用適當演算法技術，由數據中探索資料之特殊樣式，提供最佳決策支援之依據。
This course introduces fundamental concepts of data science. Guide students to learn basic programming and application tools. Students will learn how to analyze data in hand or collect practical data from Internet, and try to define new and creative problems. In addition, students will also learn basic algorithms to approach the solutions. Exploring and discovering the special patterns of data can provide a way for the best decision support.
